get.description: SportsDataIO's proprietary projections, including DFS salary information and injuries, for fantasy players, called by date.
get.summary: Projected Player Game Stats - by Date

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Desired response format. Valid entries are XML or JSON.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description:
The date of the game(s).
Examples: 2017-JUL-31, 2017-SEP-01.

get.description: SportsDataIO's proprietary projections, including DFS salary information and injuries, for fantasy players, called by player and date.
get.summary: Projected Player Game Stats by Player (w/ Injuries, DFS Salaries)

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Desired response format. Valid entries are XML or JSON.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description:
The date of the game(s).
Examples: 2017-JUL-31, 2017-SEP-01.

parameters.name: playerid
parameters.description: Unique FantasyData Player ID. Example:10000507.

get.description: SportsDataIO's proprietary projections, including average draft position, for all active players for the season.
get.summary: Projected Player Season Stats With ADP

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Desired response format. Valid entries are XML or JSON.

parameters.name: season
parameters.description:
Year of the season.
Examples: 2017, 2018.

get.description: Returns DFS Slates which have not yet started for which we have DFS projections.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Desired response format. Valid entries are XML or JSON.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description:
The date of the slates.
Examples: 2017-JUL-31, 2017-SEP-01.

get.description: This endpoint provides all currently injured MLB players, along with injury details.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Desired response format. Valid entries are XML or JSON.

get.description: Returns both projected and confirmed starting lineups for all games on a given date.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Desired response format. Valid entries are XML or JSON.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description:
The date of the slates.
Examples: 2017-JUL-31, 2017-SEP-01.

get.description: Returns Depth Charts for all active MLB teams.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Desired response format. Valid entries are XML or JSON.

get.description: BAKER Projected Player Game Stats - by Date
get.summary: BAKER Projected Player Game Stats - by Date

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Desired response format. Valid entries are XML or JSON.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description:
The date of the game(s).
Examples: 2023-JUL-31, 2023-SEP-01.

get.description: BAKER Projected Player Game Stats - by Date
get.summary: BAKER Projected Player Game Stats - by Date

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Desired response format. Valid entries are XML or JSON.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description:
The date of the game(s).
Examples: 2023-JUL-31, 2023-SEP-01.

parameters.name: team
parameters.description:
The abbreviation of the requested team.
Examples: SF, NYY.

get.description: Slate Ownership Projections for a specific slate. Projections are for Guaranteed Prize Pool (GPP) format ownership. Will return an empty list if the slate is not yet projected or not a slate we have projections for.
get.summary: DFS Slate Ownership Projections - by Slate

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Desired response format. Valid entries are XML or JSON.

parameters.name: slateId
parameters.description: SlateID of the DFS Slate you wish to get ownership projections for. Will have an empty SlateOwnershipProjections if this slate was not projected

get.description: Returns DFS Slates which have not yet started for which we have DFS Ownership projections.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Desired response format. Valid entries are XML or JSON.
